title: Libra Daily Horoscope
text:
From ELLE

Monday 07, October

Your love life is lit today, Libra. The Moon moves into your romance and pleasure zone for the next few days, bringing good vibes and amorous moments to the fore. Focus on what you love at the exclusion of all else; just for a few hours at least.

See all daily horoscopes

Libra monthly horoscope

Bookmark this page to easily find your daily horoscope!

Sunday 06, October

The communication planet opposes the planet of radical change early tomorrow morning, and some intense energy is building up this Sunday. If you feel stressed or edgy, especially about money and shared resources, don't make any sudden moves. It'll pass in a few days.

Saturday 05, October

With the Moon in Capricorn this Saturday, you're all about being a domestic goddess. Lunar energy is flooding your home zone for the next few days, so spending time in your private sanctuary is highly recommended. It's great for connecting with your family or just chilling on the sofa and streaming your favourite shows.

Friday 04, October

With Mars, the planet of passion and action, moving into your own stars today, you get a free pass to pursue your desires. The stars insist that you feel the depths of what you want, Libra - without holding back at all. Don't let anyone tell you that you're too much.

Thursday 03, October

Mercury leaves your sign and slips into your money zone today, just as Pluto goes direct in your house of home. There's a renewed and very practical focus on your finances in the next few weeks, but at an even deeper level, your family connections and ancestral ties are really speaking to you now.

Wednesday 02, October

The Moon moves into your communication zone today and opens doors for deeper understanding. You can get to both the brass tacks and the deeper philosophical foundations of most matters, Libra. Use the next few days to get your message across, because people are listening to you now.

Tuesday 01, October

The Moon is in your money zone again today, and your focus turns toward what you want to magnetize. With your ruler Venus still lingering in a square to powerful Pluto, everything continues to feel profoundly powerful and possibly a bit overwhelming. Give yourself a break if you need it, birthday bb.

Libra 2018



Libra personality profile
